meanings.definition: A variant of soccer played indoors with five players on each side.
meanings.sent1: We played futsal at the gym yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The local community center hosts futsal games every weekend.
meanings.sent3: During the rainy day, we decided to play futsal inside the house.
meanings.sent4: Her quick footwork in futsal was like a dance on the court.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the futsal ball hitting the wall echoed in the indoor arena.

meanings.definition: The ball used in futsal, typically smaller and heavier than a regular soccer ball.
meanings.sent1: The futsal rolled smoothly on the wooden floor.
meanings.sent2: Players need good control to handle the futsal effectively.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous dog ran off with the futsal from the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The weight of the futsal in his hands felt like a small medicine ball.
meanings.sent5: Kicking the futsal against the wall made a satisfying thud sound.
